shows.title: Les Amazones d’Afrique
shows.desc: Les Amazones d’Afrique are a true supergroup: a cross-generational collective of some of West Africa’s greatest female singers. Early cut I Play the Kora made waves and established them as powerful voices for social justice, in a culture where kora playing was a male privilege. With music that moves the heart and the feet, they hit the Greenbelt sweet spot.
